query: Compare the Pre-Hearing Briefs from both parties on the estimate issue.
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: Compare the Pre-Hearing Briefs from both parties on the estimate issue.

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
In your expert opinion, how did Gulfstream’s conduct compare with typical MRO performance in similar events?

[207-329.pdf, p.63]
his in progress work order compared with proposal he signed (attached for reference) to look for redundant tasks.

[207-329.pdf, p.81]
corrosion evaluation efforts (removal, NDT, analysis). Due to Sheetmetallabor demand compared to

[207-329.pdf, p.112]
review & compare the 5174 scope versus the 192-MO so we can delete any items that are already being

[1. Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
How did the final sale price compare to the May 2024 APA?

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
In comparing the proposals, it appeared the cost estimate contained in the Proposal (from Gulfstream US for St. Louis) was the least expensive. I understood this was likely due to lower labor rates or other efficiencies in the US compared to Europe.

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
Gulfstream also tried to blame delays on alleged late payments by CITIOM. This is a deflection tactic. Any minor administrative delays in payments were insignificant compared to the months-long delays caused by Gulfstream's mismanagement and did not justify the catastrophic project failure.

[NO exhibits - CITIOM EXPERT REPORT - D. Farnham Expert Report - Mar 21 2025 copy.pdf, p.16]
Gulfstream often have different cost structures and service models compared to independent

[NO exhibits - CITIOM EXPERT REPORT - D. Farnham Expert Report - Mar 21 2025 copy.pdf, p.16]
compared to independent MRO facilities. This is a factor aircraft owners must consider when

[NO exhibits - CITIOM EXPERT REPORT - D. Farnham Expert Report - Mar 21 2025 copy.pdf, p.16]
compared to independent MROs. Gulfstream's downtime and costs in these areas are often

[Bassim Draft Witness Statement.docx, p.1]
I visited the St. Louis facility myself in May 2024. Seeing the Aircraft completely disassembled, with parts scattered, and hearing about the massive cost and manhour overruns (already exceeding 14,000 hours versus the quoted 2,800), confirmed the severity of the problem. It was clear the project was being grossly mismanaged.

[1. Bassim Haider Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Proposal included disclaimers | Emphasize lack of updated quote after estimator tool, reliance on OEM relationship | Did Gulfstream ever revise its quote after developing its July 2023 tool? | Pre-Hearing Brief at 8; ASOC ¶¶ 13–14

[Gulfstream - Prehearing Brief .pdf, p.1]
PREHEARING BRIEF

[Gulfstream - Prehearing Brief .pdf, p.4]
1 We note that Claimant also includes arguments in its pre-hearing brief alleging spoliation of evidence and

[Gulfstream - Prehearing Brief .pdf, p.25]
input the Aircraft to Gulfstream.” (Channel IT’s Prehearing Brief, at p. 28.)
